item.description: Markdown Basics Prerequisite Install Auto-Open Markdown Preview VSCode extension Heading 1 Heading 2 Heading 3 Heading 4 Heading 5 Italics This text is italic This text is italic Bold This text is bold This text is bold Strikethrough This text is strikethrough ~~This text~~ ignores special character Horizontal Rule Blockquote This is a quote This is a new quote Links This is a regular link https://www.google.com This is a sandwich link
